author: Darrell Etherington
title: Kinsa’s fever map could show just how crucial it is to stay home to stop COVID-19 spread
description: Smart thermometer maker Kinsa has been working on building, accurate, predictive models of how seasonal illnesses like the flu travel in and among communities – and its fever map is finding new utility as the novel coronavirus pandemic grows globally. While K…
